title: Latam Insights: Bukele Frontrunned Blackrock’s Bitcoin ETF Move, Bitcoin Lease Contracts in Argentina
description: Welcome to Latam Insights, a compendium of Latin America’s most relevant crypto and economic news during the last week. In this issue: El Salvador’s President Nayib Bukele states they got into Bitcoin before Blackrock, the first bitcoin-settled lease contract goes live in Argentina, and the Venezuelan petro will be liquidated, according to reports. El Salvador […]

title: Warner Bros. Lifts NDA on Suicide Squad Alpha Test Impressions
description: In a surprising move, Warner Bros. has decided to lift the non-disclosure agreements (NDAs) for alpha testers of the highly anticipated game Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League. This decision comes from a series of press previews, including one from VGC, which suggested that the game may not revolutionize the superhero genre as the previous […]

title: Binance Coin Price Prediction 2024-2033: Is BNB Ready for the Bull Run?
description: Binance Coin Price Prediction 2024-2033 In the wake of the recent resignation of Binance’s CZ Zhao, and the ensuing lawsuit, which has gotten the former CEO to plead guilty to money laundering violations levied by the USDOJ, BNB has since plummeted by 7.91% since touching $253 in November 2023. What next for BNB in 2024? Let’s get […]

title: Rapid Growth of AI Skills Demand in Canada’s Tech Industry
description: As Canadian tech companies increasingly seek AI-skilled professionals, individuals are presented with numerous opportunities to acquire AI knowledge through free online courses and programs. In response to the growing importance of artificial intelligence in the job market, industry leaders and educational institutions are offering accessible avenues for skill development. title: Top cryptos to watch this week: BTC, XRP, SHIB
description: Despite the recent market-wide slump, the global crypto market cap recorded a 3.68% increase this week to $1.69 trillion, with substantial contributions from BTC, XRP and SHIB.

title: Hedera and Algorand join forces to create DeRec Alliance
description: Hedera Council approves USD 408 million in HBAR to drive growth and move towards decentralized governance. The allocation will strengthen key initiatives and support ecosystem partners, consolidating Hedera’s position in cryptocurrencies. In a key decision, the Hedera Council, the governing body of the Hedera network, has given the green light for the allocation of 4.86 [...]
